name: Anglo-North Irish Fish Producers Organisation Limited
membership: Member of National Federations of Fishermen's Associations
goal: ANIFPO is a Fish Producer Organisation with a remit to represent its members interests at local, national and international level. ANIFPO also manages quota on behalf of its members and leads on improving and promoting sustainability.
euInitiatives: Common Fishery Policy, Landing Obligation, Human Rights at Sea, Health and Safety
